    • Uses of Configurer in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.configurer

      Subinterfaces of Configurer in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.configurer 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  MessagingConfigurer
      Specialized interface of Configurer generic interface.
      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.configurer that implement Configurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultMessagingConfigurer
      Default configurer that is automatically applied every time a MessagingBuilder instance is created through MessagingBuilder.standard() or MessagingBuilder.minimal().
      class  MessagingConfigurerAdapter
      Adapter that configures a MessagingBuilder instance.

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.spring.common that implement Configurer

    • Uses of Configurer in fr.sii.ogham.spring.email

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.spring.email that implement Configurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSpringSendGridConfigurer
      Integrates with Spring SendGrid by using Spring properties defined with prefix spring.sendgrid (see SendGridProperties).
      class  SpringMailConfigurer
      Integrates with Spring Mail by using Spring properties defined with prefix spring.mail (see MailProperties).

    • Uses of Configurer in fr.sii.ogham.spring.general

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SpringGeneralMessagingConfigurer
      This configurer is useful to support property naming variants (see Relaxed Binding).

    • Uses of Configurer in fr.sii.ogham.spring.sms

      class  SpringOvhSmsConfigurer

    • Uses of Configurer in fr.sii.ogham.spring.template

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.spring.template that implement Configurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FreemarkerConfigurer
      Integrates with Spring templating system by using Freemarker Configuration object provided by Spring and by using Spring properties defined with prefix spring.freemarker (see FreeMarkerProperties).
      class  NoTemplateEngineConfigurer 
      class  ThymeLeafConfigurer
      Integrates with Spring templating system by using SpringTemplateEngine object provided by Spring and by using Spring properties defined with prefix spring.thymeleaf (see ThymeleafProperties).
